description:
Wakamiya Seiya is a prominent part of the story and part of http://anidb.net/ch64305 [Akira]`s entourage. She seems to be close with http://anidb.net/ch64310 [Sayaka].
During the first part of the story, she discovers rooms in the mansion that are identical to that of her own at home. She is also the only woman of the entourage not be kidnapped by http://anidb.net/ch60801 [Maya]. During, the second part of the story she loses consequences, but is later revealed to be Maya.
She has fair skin, brown eyes. Her hair is dark brown long and part of it is plaited. She wears a beige casual button-down shirt decorated with a rusty red ribbon and a chocolate brown knife pleated mini skirt. Light gray stocking and brown leather shoes. Underneath, she wears light pink lace bra, but apparently no other underwear. Much like her friends, she has pubic hair.
name: Wakamiya Seiya
